solve(int) - Method in class core.Solver
Solves the given maximization problem with the given heuristics and returns the optimal solution if it exists.

Solves the problem with no timeout.
solveExact() - Method in class mdd.MDD
Solves the given problem starting from the given node.
Solver - Class in core
Implementation of the branch and bound algorithm for MDDs.
Solver(Problem) - Constructor for class core.Solver
Constructor of the solver with default heuristics.
Solver(Problem, MergeSelector, DeleteSelector, VariableSelector) - Constructor for class core.Solver
Constructor of the solver : allows the user to choose heuristics.
solveRelaxed(int) - Method in class mdd.MDD
Solves the given problem starting from the given node with layers of at most width nodes by merging some nodes and thus providing a solution not always feasible.
solveRestricted(int) - Method in class mdd.MDD
Solves the given problem starting from the given node with layers of at most width nodes by deleting some nodes and thus providing a feasible solution.
state - Variable in class mdd.Node
 
State - Interface in mdd
State representation in order to merge equivalent nodes in the MDD recursion.
successors(Node, Variable) - Method in interface core.Problem
Given a node and a variable, returns the list of nodes reached after having assigned the variable to every possible value.
